医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
非洲超过 100 万人死亡与抗菌素耐药性有关在世卫组织非洲区域，超过 105 万人死亡与抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 有关，其中 25 万人因抗菌素耐药性死亡，构成了前所未有的健康威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Over-1-million-deaths-linked-to-antimicrobial-resistance-in-Africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Over-1-million-deaths-linked-to-antimicrobial-resistance-in-Africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c0e19e55-2b0d-4a27-b096-e58be7bcede7 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 23:13:57 -0500 Over 1 million deaths linked to antimicrobial resistance in Africa
研究揭示细胞珠蛋白在发育过程中纤毛运动和器官定位中的关键作用研究表明，细胞珠蛋白 (cygb2) 在发育过程中调节纤毛运动和器官侧向性方面发挥着至关重要的作用，凸显了其在 NO 信号传导和纤毛功能中的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Study-reveals-cytoglobins-pivotal-role-in-cilia-movement-and-organ-positioning-during-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Study-reveals-cytoglobins-pivotal-role-in-cilia-movement-and-organ-positioning-during-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba8f7a7d-3220-461b-a478-0addf3a00125 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 22:26:00 -0500 Study reveals cytoglobin's pivotal role in cilia movement and organ positioning during development
医疗保健领域的人工智能：一把双刃剑？研究揭示了对诊断准确性的影响研究调查了人工智能对临床医生诊断准确性的影响，揭示人工智能解释并不能显着减轻有偏见的人工智能模型的有害影响，强调需要在临床环境中仔细验证人工智能工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/AI-in-healthcare-A-double-edged-sword-Study-reveals-impact-on-diagnostic-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/AI-in-healthcare-A-double-edged-sword-Study-reveals-impact-on-diagnostic-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e8ef958-7b9a-49a2-8a7a-3a8746a1d7c5 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 22:15:00 -0500 AI in healthcare: A double-edged sword? Study reveals impact on diagnostic accuracy
胚胎免疫传感器可能是创建患者来源的造血干细胞的关键帮助识别和对抗细菌感染的微生物传感器在造血干细胞的发育中也发挥着关键作用，这为创造患者来源的造血干细胞从而消除骨髓移植的需要提供了宝贵的新见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Embryonic-immune-sensor-could-key-to-creating-病人-衍生-blood-stem-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Embryonic-immune-sensor-could-key-to-creating-病人-衍生-blood-stem-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63139aaf-2f53-4f49-a71e-fe23f21c7670 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 22:04:49 -0500 Embryonic immune sensor could key to creating patient-derived blood stem cells
子宫内膜癌发病率惊人上升，尤其是黑人女性这些数字是严峻且令人深感不安的。子宫内膜癌 -;它在子宫内膜（子宫）内发育，有时称为子宫癌 -；美国的病例呈上升趋势，1987年，每年有35,000例病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Endometrial-cancer-rates-rising-alarmingly-pspecially-among-Black-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Endometrial-cancer-rates-rising-alarmingly-pspecially-among-Black-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a382a2a7-cb4a-4e28-9fe7-89a2a426de98 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 21:56:34 -0500 Endometrial cancer rates rising alarmingly, particularly among Black women
研究：抑郁、焦虑和创伤后应激障碍在严重中风幸存者的照顾者中很常见中风是一种突然的、毁灭性的疾病，它会立即改变一个人的生活，并有可能导致持久的残疾或死亡。然而，这种情况也对患者的亲人产生了深远的影响——；他们经常被要求快速做出艰难的决定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Study-Depression-anxiety-and-PTSD-common-among-caregivers-of-severe-中风-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Study-Depression-anxiety-and-PTSD-common-among-caregivers-of-severe-中风-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2297969d-8228-44d0-abcf-c3ee06dd5db0 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 21:40:51 -0500 Study: Depression, anxiety and PTSD common among caregivers of severe stroke survivors
医院每天刷牙与肺炎病例和 ICU 死亡率大幅下降有关研究表明，每天刷牙可显着降低医院获得性肺炎 (HAP) 的发病率，尤其是机械通气患者，从而缩短 ICU 停留时间并降低 ICU 死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Daily-toothbrushing-in-hospitals-linked-to-significant-drop-in-pneumonia-cases-and-ICU-mortality-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Daily-toothbrushing-in-hospitals-linked-to-significant-drop-in-pneumonia-cases-and-ICU-mortality-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab6643bc-a05c-4413-aa6c-74ff9efb179d Tue, 19 Dec 2023 19:17:00 -0500 Daily toothbrushing in hospitals linked to significant drop in pneumonia cases and ICU mortality rates
使用视网膜图像的人工智能模型在诊断自闭症方面实现了完美的准确性研究表明，使用高分辨率视网膜图像的深度集成模型 (DEM) 可以准确诊断儿童自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD)，ASD 检测的 AUROC 为 1.00，估计 ASD 严重程度的 AUROC 为 0.74，为计算机辅助诊断提供了一种有前途的方法。自闭症谱系障碍诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/AI-models-using-retinal-images-achieve-perfect-accuracy-in-diagnosing-autism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/AI-models-using-retinal-images-achieve-perfect-accuracy-in-diagnosing-autism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ab8c1f8-da56-47fe-9a8a-4c0ba3436b0c Tue, 19 Dec 2023 18:58:00 -0500 AI models using retinal images achieve perfect accuracy in diagnosing autism
菜单上的营养标签带来更健康的选择，最多可减少 25% 的卡路里研究分析了 Taco Bell 餐厅 9 年的数据，显示营养菜单标签使每次交易的卡路里减少了 22-25%，支持 2010 年美国患者保护和平价医疗法案在促进健康饮食方面的有效性选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Nutritional-labels-on-menus-lead-to-healthier-choices-cutting-calories-by-up-to-2525.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/Nutritional-labels-on-menus-lead-to-healthier-choices-cutting-calories-by-up-to-2525.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a63505f1-5bab-4e7c-993f-3d93665c038e Tue, 19 Dec 2023 18:37:00 -0500 Nutritional labels on menus lead to healthier choices, cutting calories by up to 25%
人工智能驱动的电子皮肤技术进步有望带来健康监测和诊断的革命评论讨论了人工智能在开发下一代电子皮肤中的集成，重点关注人机界面和疾病诊断应用中的工程挑战、信号处理和健康数据分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/AI-driven-advancements-in-electronic-skin-technology-promise-revolution-in-health-monitoring-and-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231219/AI-driven-advancements-in-electronic-skin-technology-promise-revolution-in-health-monitoring-and-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98a7d21e-7f1f-4a80-b301-7581803eb592 Tue, 19 Dec 2023 17:59:00 -0500 AI-driven advancements in electronic skin technology promise revolution in health monitoring and diagnostics
